data.datasets.util.df_from_dirlist¶

data.datasets.util.df_from_dirlist(dirlist)¶

Creates a pandas dataframe from the files in a list of directories

Parameters

dirlist – a list of directories where the last sub-directory is the class label for the images within

Returns

a pandas dataframe with columns=[‘filepath’, ‘class’]
